narrative.narrative: AlMasria Universal Airlines are based at Cairo and have a secondary hub at Alexandria. It commenced operations in 2009 and flies from Cairo to five Saudi Arabian airports and Bergamo near Milan,Italy. It also flies from Alexandria to Jeddah. It has an agreement with EgyptAir to have them do its maintenance,ground handling,flight crew training and catering. As of November 2014 they had an A321 and an A320. It also has a summer base at Mostar,Bosnia and Herzegovina.
